thread.title: BRIEF-Valero To Purchase Semlogistics Milford Haven Fuel Storage Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valero To Purchase Semlogistics Milford Haven Fuel Storage Facility

organizations.name: semlogistics milford haven fuel storage facility

text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Valero Energy Corp:
* VALERO TO PURCHASE SEMLOGISTICS MILFORD HAVEN FUEL STORAGE FACILITY
* VALERO ENERGY CORP - MILFORD HAVEN FUEL STORAGE FACILITY HAS 8.5 MILLION BARRELS OF CAPACITY FOR STORING FUEL
* VALERO - ‍VALERO ALSO EXPECTS TO RETAIN UK EMPLOYEES CURRENTLY ENGAGED IN BUSINESS TO BE ACQUIRED​
* VALERO - ‍MILFORD HAVEN WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE AS A THIRD-PARTY STORAGE FACILITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
